channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Barrier and cone left by new railings that have been fitted in benhall park near to children’s play park as you walk on the path through the middle of the park towards willersley road, 7th August
item.description:
New railings have been fitted at the bridge by the path that cuts through the park by the children’s play park. Barriers and a cone have been left there and not removed. The path goes through to willersley road from bibury road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willersey Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Brambles growing across the pavement.Lasne crescent sign broken, 6th August
item.description:
Road sign leading into Lasne Crescent Brockworth broken. Bramble’s growing across pavement leading into Lasne Crescent Brockworth
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lasne Crescent, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large cracks along length of cycle path that could trap a bike wheel and cause accident, 6th August
item.description:
The shared cycleway and footpath that runs from Liddington Road to the Premier Inn Barnwood. Many long cracks have been steadily getting wider along its entire length to the point that they are now wide enough to trap a bike wheel and cause a nasty accident.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep hole in road. Only appeared very recently., 6th August
item.description:
It is by the end of terrace of Sudeley View cottagesin Winchcombe. Next to a water drain. There have been problems here over thd past year or so. It seems dangerous because vehicles are continually driving over it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Cheltenham Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain in the road, 6th August
item.description:
The drain in the road directly outside no 8 Gloucester street Winchcombe gL54 5LU is blocked and poses a flooding hazard. If it could be cleared the residents on that side of the street would appreciate it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Street, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic light from Christ Church Road onto Lansdown Road is only 10 seconds, 6th August
item.description:
Traffic light from Christ Church Road onto Lansdown Road is only 10 seconds Letting 2 cars through
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Talbot Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: The post nearest to the camera is loose and not fixed in the ground properly., 6th August
item.description:
The post is roughly at grid reference SO 86350 20606, part of the trim trail.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Goldsmith Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain cover missing, 6th August
item.description:
On the left side of road, as if you are coming from the main road, just before the turning into baynham way. It has been like it for quite a while and will easily cause somebody to at least break an ankle if the do not see it as the is street is not lit well at night. The drain is also quite deep
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rose and Crown Passage, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole cover loose, 6th August
item.description:
Outside 216 Cheltenham Road Reported in July says needs permanent repair but still nothing done.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 pink scooters on pavements in Noverton, 6th August
item.description:
1 x scooter on footpath between Noverton Avenue and Desert Orchid Road 1 x scooter in middle of footpath outside no. 36 Noverton Lane Parking fines should be issued to last known users of these nuisance devices
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Gallops Lane, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 6th August
item.description:
Just past the M5 junction off A417 under the bridge there is some fly tipping looks to be mostly in black bags.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Bypass, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a 7.5T restriction for vehicles crossing the bridge over the M5. On the Brockworth side of the bridge there are two restriction signs, one either side of the road, but on the abbeymead side, there is only one sign and I suggest this is contributing to the rat running of HGV's along Lobleys Drive., 6th August
item.description:
The missing sign is on Lobleys Drive, Abbeymead, Gloucester, as you approach the bridge over the M5 whilst travelling in the Brockworth direction. What Three Words: hotels.spots.call
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public right of way gatw padlocked, 6th August
